org.apache.taverna.reference.impl

Class InMemoryReferenceSetDao

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.taverna.reference.impl.InMemoryReferenceSetDao
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ReferenceSetDao

    public class InMemoryReferenceSetDao
extends Object
implements ReferenceSetDao
    A trivial in-memory implementation of ReferenceSetDao for either testing or very lightweight embedded systems. Uses a java Map as the backing store.
    Author:
    Tom Oinn
